DurationRange.description:
Defines a duration range. The range has always at least one value not NULL between min and max
 *   When min and max have the same value it represents an exact duration
 *   When min is NULL it means the duration may not have a specific lower limit or it is unknown (Up to some duration)
 *   When max are NULL it means the duration may not have a specific upper limit or it is unknown (From some duration)
 *   When min and max exist it means the duration may last between min and max

list_limit.description: Maximum number of lists to return

venue_limit.name: venue_limit
venue_limit.description: Maximum number of venues to return

hotel_limit.name: hotel_limit
hotel_limit.description: Maximum number of hotels to return

pickup_limit.name: pickup_limit
pickup_limit.description: Maximum number of pickups to return

max_distance_from_city.name: max_distance_from_city
max_distance_from_city.description: Maximum distance expressed with its unit from a given city id, accepts kilometers and miles. E.G.: 231|100KM or 51234|12.23233|62M

listtags.name: listtags
listtags.description: List of tags to filter by. A collection of tags

listtypes.name: listtypes
listtypes.description: List type to filter by. A collection of list type

venue_in.name: venue_in
venue_in.description: Filter, include only results from given verticals identified by a collection of ids

with_ticket_status.name: with_ticket_status
with_ticket_status.description: Filter, include only results with given ticket statuses

pricetagCode.name: pricetagCode
pricetagCode.description: Full pricetag code holder and feature separated by pipe | Example: adult|entrance-with-audioguide

time.name: time
time.description: String containing hours and minutes in the format 'HH-MM' | Example: 22-40

coordinates.name: coordinates
coordinates.description: Coordinates as comma separated longitude and latitude | Example: 45.7386,-9.3641

distance.name: distance
distance.description: Distance from given coordinates expressed with an integer followed by unit | `KM` for kilometers, `M` for miles | Requires the other parameters called `coordinates` to be set in the same request | Example: 334KM

default_price_range.name: default_price_range
default_price_range.description: Price range as comma separated values, accepts only floats positive or equals to 0, two points precision | Currency is inferred from X-Musement-Currency header | Example: 0.00,34.23

ticketId.name: ticketId
ticketId.description: Unique id of the ticket to be downloaded for order and activity

scopes.customer:read: Read customer data: profile data, information about the orders

scopes.price: Read ad hoc prices for an activity
scopes.no-payment: Can use the 'no-payment' flow to pay an order

externalDocs.description: Find out more about Musement API
